column4: so im trying to get my broadcom wireless adapter working and im stuck. it says it recognizes it and according to the wiki it should be supported but it still wont connect.
does anyone know how to install BCM43xx-fwcutter (apt) ?
The last I read at the help.ubuntu.com website, the bcm43xx modules all ready come with Hardy. Are you using Hardy?
Yes im using hardy. And that is why I'm not sure why it wont work. I seem to have lost my network manager from my taskbar too.
